danish_publication: Der er en höj på vor ejendom, der kaldes Hestehöj, og der har også dumret der inde, men ingen har set bjærgfolk der. Der imod har de set et lys, der har stået og brændt på den, og når de kom i nærheden, blev det henne. A har også selv set det lys og gået efter det. Det er ikke uden tre uger siden, vor sön kom hjem og sagde, at nu var der lys igjen.
english_publication: There was a mound on our property called Hestehøj (Horse mound), and there had also been rumbling noises in there, but no one had seen any mound folk. On the other hand, they had seen a light that burned on it but, when they got close, it disappeared. I've seen the light too and gone after it. It isn't three weeks since our son came home and said the light was there again.
